content: The increase of $3.7 million was mainly due to the acquisitions of the Nano-X market platform in November 2021, the consolidation of Nano-X AI in U.S.  with the company since the fourth quarter of 2021, an increase in the company's headcount and the overall organization infrastructure and an increase in the Company's legal fees due to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission Inquiry and the class action litigation as described in the company's Form 20-F for the year ended December 31st, 2021 filed on May 2nd, 2022.
